items.name: Latency Profiles: Create/Open Custom Overrides
items.description: Creates ProgramData\FalconOptimizer\latency_overrides.json if missing and opens it so you can set custom values (scheduler, timer resolution, BCDEdit). Requires admin to write ProgramData.

items.name: Apply: BCDEdit Profile: Custom (from overrides)
items.description: Uses overrides file -> bcdedit.{disabledynamictick,useplatformtick,useplatformclock}. Backs up first.
Uses overrides file -> bcdedit.{disabledynamictick,useplatformtick,useplatformclock}. Backs up first.
items.name: Revert: BCDEdit Profile: Custom (from overrides)
CTT Paradime System: Disable SysMain
items.description: Stops SysMain (Superfetch) to reduce background activity.

steps.command: Stop-Service SysMain -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service SysMain -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service SysMain -StartupType Automatic -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Service SysMain -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Disable Windows Search

steps.command: Stop-Service WSearch -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service WSearch -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service WSearch -StartupType Automatic -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Service WSearch -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Disable Delivery Optimization
items.description: Stops DoSvc to reduce background downloads.

steps.command: Stop-Service DoSvc -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service DoSvc -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service DoSvc -StartupType Manual -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Disable hibernate
items.description: Disables hibernation file (frees disk and reduces some wake behavior).

steps.command: powercfg -h off
powercfg -h on

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Disable USB selective suspend
items.description: Disables selective suspend via power settings.

steps.command: powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_USB USBSELECTSUSPEND 0; powercfg -S SCHEME_CURRENT
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_USB USBSELECTSUSPEND 1; powercfg -S SCHEME_CURRENT

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Enable ultimate performance plan (if present)
items.description: Switches to Ultimate Performance if available.

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Device manager summary

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\ctt_paradime_system"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("ctt_paradime_system_slice_9_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== CTT Paradime System Slice 9: Device manager summary ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
Get-PnpDevice | Select-Object -First 200 Class,FriendlyName,Status | Format-Table -Wrap | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Powercfg qh subset

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\ctt_paradime_system"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("ctt_paradime_system_slice_10_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== CTT Paradime System Slice 10: Powercfg qh subset ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
powercfg /qh | Select-Object -First 220 | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Registry: multimedia systemprofile

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\ctt_paradime_system"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("ctt_paradime_system_slice_11_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== CTT Paradime System Slice 11: Registry: multimedia systemprofile ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
reg query "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Multimedia\SystemProfile" /s 2>$null | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\ctt_paradime_system"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("ctt_paradime_system_slice_12_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== CTT Paradime System Slice 12: BCDEdit current ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
bcdedit /enum {current} | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: CTT Paradime System: Netsh tcp global

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\ctt_paradime_system"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("ctt_paradime_system_slice_13_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== CTT Paradime System Slice 13: Netsh tcp global ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
netsh int tcp show global | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: Paradime Advanced: Disable SysMain
items.description: Stops SysMain (Superfetch) to reduce background activity.

steps.command: Stop-Service SysMain -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service SysMain -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service SysMain -StartupType Automatic -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Service SysMain -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Stop-Service WSearch -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service WSearch -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service WSearch -StartupType Automatic -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Service WSearch -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

items.name: Paradime Advanced: Disable Delivery Optimization
items.description: Stops DoSvc to reduce background downloads.

steps.command: Stop-Service DoSvc -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service DoSvc -StartupType Disabled
Set-Service DoSvc -StartupType Manual -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

items.name: Paradime Advanced: Disable hibernate
items.description: Disables hibernation file (frees disk and reduces some wake behavior).

steps.command: powercfg -h off
powercfg -h on

items.name: Paradime Advanced: Disable USB selective suspend
items.description: Disables selective suspend via power settings.

steps.command: powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_USB USBSELECTSUSPEND 0; powercfg -S SCHEME_CURRENT
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_USB USBSELECTSUSPEND 1; powercfg -S SCHEME_CURRENT

items.name: Paradime Advanced: Enable ultimate performance plan (if present)
items.description: Switches to Ultimate Performance if available.

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\paradime_advanced"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("paradime_advanced_slice_9_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Paradime Advanced Slice 9: Device manager summary ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
Get-PnpDevice | Select-Object -First 200 Class,FriendlyName,Status | Format-Table -Wrap | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\paradime_advanced"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("paradime_advanced_slice_10_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Paradime Advanced Slice 10: Powercfg qh subset ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
powercfg /qh | Select-Object -First 220 | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\paradime_advanced"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("paradime_advanced_slice_11_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Paradime Advanced Slice 11: Registry: multimedia systemprofile ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
reg query "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Multimedia\SystemProfile" /s 2>$null | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\paradime_advanced"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("paradime_advanced_slice_12_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Paradime Advanced Slice 12: BCDEdit current ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
bcdedit /enum {current} | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\paradime_advanced"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("paradime_advanced_slice_13_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Paradime Advanced Slice 13: Netsh tcp global ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8
netsh int tcp show global | Out-File $fn -Append
Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: Aphrodite: Disable Dynamic Tick
items.description: Disables dynamic tick (may reduce latency variance).

steps.command: bcdedit /set disabledynamictick yes
bcdedit /deletevalue disabledynamictick

items.name: Aphrodite: Disable HPET platform clock
items.description: Disables useplatformclock (only if you know it helps on your rig).

steps.command: bcdedit /deletevalue useplatformclock
bcdedit /set useplatformclock true

items.name: Aphrodite: Set system timer resolution helper on

steps.command:
Start-Process -FilePath "powershell" -ArgumentList "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command `"& { Set-ProcessMitigation -System -Enable ForceRelocateImages }`"" -WindowStyle Hidden -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Write-Output "Timer helper placeholder (integrate with your timer module)"

items.name: Aphrodite: MMCSS gaming profile
items.description: Applies MMCSS responsiveness tuning for games.

items.name: Aphrodite Extra: Drivers with oldest dates (15)

steps.command:
$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\aphrodite_latency"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("aphrodite_extra_15_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Aphrodite Extra 15: Drivers with oldest dates ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8

"Oldest signed drivers:" | Out-File $fn -Append
Get-CimInstance Win32_PnPSignedDriver | Sort DriverDate | Select-Object -First 60 DeviceName,DriverDate,DriverVersion | Format-Table -Wrap | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append

Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\aphrodite_latency"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("aphrodite_extra_16_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Aphrodite Extra 16: WMI latency checks ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8

"WMI quick check:" | Out-File $fn -Append
Get-CimInstance Win32_OperatingSystem | Select Caption,Version,BuildNumber | Format-List | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append

Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\aphrodite_latency"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("aphrodite_extra_17_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Aphrodite Extra 17: Services non-default start (delta) ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8

"Non-default service start:" | Out-File $fn -Append
Get-CimInstance Win32_Service | Where-Object {$_.StartMode -ne "Auto"} | Select-Object -First 200 Name,StartMode,State | Format-Table -AutoSize | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append

Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

$dst = Join-Path $env:ProgramData "FalconOptimizer\aphrodite_latency"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null
$fn = Join-Path $dst ("aphrodite_extra_18_" + (Get-Date).ToString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss') + ".txt")
"=== Aphrodite Extra 18: Scheduled tasks (top) ===" | Out-File $fn -Encoding utf8

"Scheduled tasks (top):" | Out-File $fn -Append
Get-ScheduledTask | Select-Object -First 120 TaskName,State | Format-Table -AutoSize | Out-String | Out-File $fn -Append

Write-Output ("Saved: " + $fn)

items.name: Analyze Explorer History / MRU Bloat
items.description: [Analyzer] Counts values/subkeys in common HKCU Explorer history zones (RunMRU, RecentDocs, OpenSaveMru, etc.).

steps.command:
Write-Output @"
Analyzer is read-only and needs no revert.
"@

items.name: Apply: Clean Explorer Run/Search History (HKCU)
items.description: [QoL + Micro-bloat] Clears Run dialog, typed paths, and Explorer search history for this user.

steps.command:
Write-Output @"
History will repopulate as you use Explorer/Run; there is no direct revert for deleted MRU entries.
"@

items.description: [QoL + Micro-bloat] Clears Run dialog, typed paths, and Explorer search history for this user.
items.name: Revert: Clean Explorer Run/Search History (HKCU)

steps.command:
Write-Output @"
History will repopulate as you use Explorer/Run; there is no direct revert for deleted MRU entries.
"@

items.name: Apply: Clean RecentDocs & Open/Save MRU (HKCU)
items.description: [QoL + Micro-bloat] Clears RecentDocs and Open/Save dialog MRU entries under HKCU.

steps.command:
Write-Output @"
RecentDocs/OpenSave MRU will repopulate naturally as you open files; there is no direct revert.
"@

items.description: [QoL + Micro-bloat] Clears RecentDocs and Open/Save dialog MRU entries under HKCU.
items.name: Revert: Clean RecentDocs & Open/Save MRU (HKCU)

steps.command:
Write-Output @"
RecentDocs/OpenSave MRU will repopulate naturally as you open files; there is no direct revert.
"@

items.name: Apply: Clear Explorer RunMRU
items.description: Deletes registry history keys for Explorer RunMRU.

steps.command: Write-Output "Clearing Explorer RunMRU"; Remove-Item -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\RunMRU" -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output "Done."
Write-Output "Restore not possible (history cleared)."

items.description: Deletes registry history keys for Explorer RunMRU.
items.name: Revert: Clear Explorer RunMRU

steps.command: Write-Output "Restore not possible (history cleared)."

items.name: Apply: Clear RecentDocs
items.description: Deletes registry history keys for RecentDocs.

steps.command: Write-Output "Clearing RecentDocs"; Remove-Item -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\RecentDocs" -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output "Done."
Write-Output "Restore not possible (history cleared)."

items.description: Deletes registry history keys for RecentDocs.
items.name: Revert: Clear RecentDocs

steps.command: Write-Output "Restore not possible (history cleared)."

Write-Output "Restore not possible (history cleared)."

items.description: Deletes registry history keys for ComDlg32 OpenSaveMRU.

items.name: Set SystemResponsiveness
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Reduce background responsiveness reservation for gaming.

items.name: Set NetworkThrottlingIndex
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Disable network throttling (can improve gaming traffic).

items.name: Graphics: GameDVR_FSEBehaviorMode
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Disable Fullscreen Optimizations behavior mode.
